body.p:
Dear Mrs. White: I am trying to
find a nice position,. I wish to
know if probably you could be of
assistance to me. I am a widow,
with one child, former, public
school teacher. I can do office work,
also do plain sewing. Any kindness
from you will be appreciated.

If this letter is given your
attention, please reply. And I will
call to see you personally for
further information.
